# The Operand Bundles Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Functions in this group operate on <a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcsupporttypes/#gafe96c433ce9154bebe8fd83e0616d495">LLVMOperandBundleRef</a> instances that correspond to <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa97c65466bdd34abda6772dd32eb5d19">llvm::OperandBundleDef</a> instances. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

Functions in this group operate on <a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcsupporttypes/#gafe96c433ce9154bebe8fd83e0616d495">LLVMOperandBundleRef</a> instances that correspond to <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa97c65466bdd34abda6772dd32eb5d19">llvm::OperandBundleDef</a> instances.

<SectionUser title="See Also">
<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa97c65466bdd34abda6772dd32eb5d19">llvm::OperandBundleDef</a>
</SectionUser>

<SectionDefinition>

## Functions

### LLVMCreateOperandBundle() {#ga88a3896e64681d5a2978c71a9f07c95a}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>LLVMOperandBundleRef LLVMCreateOperandBundle (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> char &#42; Tag, size&#95;t TagLen, <a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcsupporttypes/#ga113ce952344691b8304a43a314f8be17">LLVMValueRef</a> &#42; Args, unsigned NumArgs)</>}>
Create a new operand bundle.

Every invocation should be paired with <a href="#gac37d053548cccbe37540b265ac187f91">LLVMDisposeOperandBundle()</a> or memory will be leaked.


<ParametersList title="Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="Tag">Tag name of the operand bundle</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="TagLen">Length of Tag</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="Args">Memory address of an array of bundle operands</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="NumArgs">Length of Args</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/core-h/#l03274">3274</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/core-h">Core.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/core-cpp/#l02745">2745</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/core-cpp">Core.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### LLVMDisposeOperandBundle() {#gac37d053548cccbe37540b265ac187f91}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void LLVMDisposeOperandBundle (<a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcsupporttypes/#gafe96c433ce9154bebe8fd83e0616d495">LLVMOperandBundleRef</a> Bundle)</>}>
Destroy an operand bundle.

This must be called for every created operand bundle or memory will be leaked.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/core-h/#l03284">3284</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/core-h">Core.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/core-cpp/#l02752">2752</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/core-cpp">Core.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

Obtain the number of operands for an operand bundle.

<ParametersList title="Parameters">

### LLVMGetOperandBundleArgAtIndex() {#ga4736de0180c9462663ed4c7097cd825a}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>LLVMValueRef LLVMGetOperandBundleArgAtIndex (<a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcsupporttypes/#gafe96c433ce9154bebe8fd83e0616d495">LLVMOperandBundleRef</a> Bundle, unsigned Index)</>}>
Obtain the operand for an operand bundle at the given index.

<ParametersList title="Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="Bundle">Operand bundle to obtain operand of.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="Index">An operand index, must be less than <a href="#ga807b9252593720aa8d4a514e05551752">LLVMGetNumOperandBundleArgs()</a>.</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>

<SectionUser title="Returns">
The operand.
</SectionUser>
